column1: Qasem Soleimani was one of the world's most ruthless terrorists.   He is directly responsible for the deaths of hundreds of Americans & thousands of civilians across the globe.  Tonight justice was served. The world is a safer place because Soleimani is no longer in it.

After a year of delays the House just passed #USMCA - a new trade deal that will create 176k jobs strengthen workers protections and grow our economy by $68 billion!  This is a huge win for folks in North Carolina and across the nation.  https://t.co/P0DniCd52q
The best place for the Democrats to express their disapproval of the President is the ballot box.    In the meantime Congress needs to stop playing games and get back to work.

Months of investigations have failed to produce any clear compelling and unambiguous evidence of impeachable high crimes or misdemeanors.  The Articles of Impeachment are based on theory hearsay and conjecture.   I will be voting against them.

Kay Hagan served the people of North Carolina with dignity & integrity. She was a well-respected legislator a strong advocate for our Armed Forces and a kind & caring friend to all who had the pleasure of knowing her.   Lucy & I send our condolences to the entire Hagan family.

Lucy and I are shocked and heartbroken by the senseless acts of evil that took 34 lives in El Paso and Dayton this weekend. Our heartfelt prayers are with the victims and their loved ones.   White nationalism is a vile and repulsive ideology that has no place in this country.

NAFTA (25yrs old) isn’t suited for a world where people shop on Amazon communicate over email & conduct banking transactions online. Today we commemorate all those who fought so bravely that day. And we remember the 2500 young American men who made the ultimate sacrifice on the beaches of France. It is because of their bravery and sacrifice that we may all live free.
